General.Name: Scirocco Energy PLC
General.Description: Scirocco Energy Plc acquires a portfolio of direct and indirect interests in the sustainable energy and circular economy assets primarily in Europe. It holds 25% interests in the Ruvuma Petroleum Sharing Agreement covering an area of approximately 3,447 square kilometers; 8.39% interests in the Kiliwani North Development License; and 1.59% interests in Helium One license located in Tanzania. The company was formerly known as Solo Oil Plc and changed its name to Scirocco Energy Plc in October 2020. Scirocco Energy Plc is based in Leeds, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 1 Park Row, Leeds, United Kingdom, LS1 5AB
